item.title: The Bisection Method - Theory and Code
item.description: Introduction The first few algorithms introduced in numerical methods courses are typically root-finding algorithms. In my opinion, these algorithms are taught first because they are relatively easy to understand and code, and determining roots of a function is a very common math operation.
